author: clundsberg
title: A fun little lego jaunt
review:
I give this an overall 5 becasue it's a neat, fun little set to have as an addition to your space collection. It's a very fast build but that experience is easily countered by some unique slightly retro parts that you just don't see a lot of in legos these days.
Due to the limited pieces this set is basically confined to being the basic speed sled model, but I find this to be comforting at times.  I think there is a niche for these smaller sets that allow a kid to build it on a road trip without the risk of losing many pieces or consuming too much time with the build and not the play.
Cool figure, very nice decal-painted pieces, neon parts and some unique shapes make this a nice little set.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Space (Insectoids) - Speed Sled
review:
The Speed Sled (6943) is a LEGO Space (Insectoids) set which came out in 1999. It comes with 1 minifig and 20 pieces. This set does include no decals and there're no mistakes in the instructions and no missing pieces.

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/6942-1.jpg[/img]


Minifigures:

Cyborg: The cyborg comes with a dark gray uniform with some nice technology markings on it and he has black pants and a dark gray belt. This minifig also has green arms, black hands, a transparent green hemlet and a nice cyborg face.

Speed Sled:

The speed sled is very simple to build but it doesn't have any play features. We get some unique pieces which I've only seen in the LEGO Space (Insectoids) theme which are the 2 curved lasers in the front. On the front you can see the laser and a nice slope piece which has some nice printings on it. On the top of that slope you can see the controls and on the back of that model is the engine. It may be a good army builder and also good for pieces but it really doesn't do anything...


Ideas:

This set also comes with 3 ideas which you can build with the pieces of this set. There're no instructions for those models but you can build them from the pictures on my website.

Positive:

Great pieces which you can use for brickfilms or MOC's
Minifig
Great starter set
No stickers
Ideas which you can build with the pieces of this set


Negative:

No play features


All in all this set is okay and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full galery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
